text: Lloyd Oliver (April 23, 1923 - March 16, 2011) was an American veteran of the United States Marine Corps and one of the original 29 members of the Navajo Code Talkers during World War II, and the brother of fellow Code Talker Willard Varnell Oliver. Oliver served from 1942 to 1945, eventually attaining the rank of corporal. Oliver was awarded the Congressional Gold Medal. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Congressional Gold Medal recipients Category:Navajo code talkers Category:American Marine Corps personnel of World War II Category:People from Shiprock, New Mexico Category:People from Avondale, Arizona Category:Military personnel from New Mexico
title: Lloyd Oliver
